posts.title: Brainstorming Brand Names Using Value Propositions
posts.descriptionshort: In this guest post, Grant Polachek from Squadhelp offers a guide to how you can create a great brand name through brainstorming.

posts.title: What Founders Need to Know: You Were Funded for a Liquidity Event – Start Looking
posts.descriptionshort: In this syndicated post, Steve Blank reminds founders who've taken funding that they need to look for potential acquirers.
posts.descriptionlong: In this syndicated post, Steve Blank reminds founders who've taken funding that they need to look for potential acquirers and lays out a strategy for doing this without obsessing about it.
posts.author: Steve Blank
